speech: Your refund will be initiated after the product passes the quality check and return is successful. The refund amount will be transferred in your original mode of payment in 4-5 business days after the pickup.
Your refund will be initiated 4-5 business days after the product is returned. The refund amount will be transferred in your original mode of payment.

Your refund will be initiated once the product passes the quality check and gets picked up. The refund amount will be transferred in your original mode of payment 4-5 business days after the successful return.
